name: Loop of Shapes
description:
you probably wont understand the tutorial but idc because this is my first finished game jam. if you do want to play it basically there is a moving hand , you have to pick up shapes and drop them in the corresponding hole

left arrow to - pick up

right arrow - drop

you have to make sure the hand is on the same 'sector' as the shape or hole in order to pick/drop it

don't mess up the controls or you loose
